name: OCKAnyPatientQuery
desc: A protocol required for patient queries, which provides customizing and sorting query results for patient data.

items.name: init(OCKAnyPatientQuery)
items.desc: Creates a new patient query from a specific query.

items.name: var sortDescriptors: [OCKPatientSortDescriptor]
items.desc: The order in which you want to sort the query results.
